casebody.data:
Henry HYMAN, Plaintiff Appellant, v. YALE ELECTRIC CORPORATION, Defendant Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 9, 1928. No. 254. Gifford & Scull, of New York City (John H. Bruninga, of St. Louis, Mo., of counsel), for appellant. Wm. S. Pritchard, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PEE CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
